```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)
library(DBI)
library(R.utils)
library(data.table)

# ignore chunk output
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  out.width = "80%",
  fig.align = "center",
  cache = TRUE
)

# automatically create a bib database for R packages
knitr::write_bib(c(.packages(), 'bookdown', 'knitr', 'rmarkdown'),
                 'packages.bib')
```

```{r helper-funcs}
#' Format a number
#'
#' Given an input x, format it to contain thousands separator and 
#' correct decimal mark.
#'
#' @param x a number to format
#'
#' @return a string representing the formatted number
#' @export
#'
#' @examples
#' fmt(10**3)
#' fmt(5000)
#' fmt(100)
#' fmt(5000.5)
fmt <- function(x) {
  format(x, big.mark = ".", decimal.mark = ",")
}
```
